tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Feedback (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   customer_id INT,
   feedback_text TEXT,
   rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE support_tickets (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID,
    ticket_title VARCHAR(100),
    ticket_description TEXT,
    ticket_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE support_tickets (
    ticket_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID,
    issue_description TEXT,
    ticket_status TEXT,
    ticket_open_date TIMESTAMP
);
